Version in Inglish


Synopsis:

"How I Met Your Mother" is a comedy about Ted and how he fell in love, the stories are told through the series of flashbacks. It all begins when Marshall's best friend Ted gives the bombshell that will ask her to marry his longtime girlfriend, Lily, a kindergarten teacher. At that moment, Ted realizes that you must act if they also hopes to find true love. Helping him in this quest is Barney, a friend who always has an opinion, some of them offensive, loves clothes and is a real clown in the tactics to meet women. When Ted meets Robin, are you sure it's love at first sight, but destiny may have something else booked for it.

Season: Seventh
Audio: English
Legend: Portuguese
Episodes: 24
